com.newmainsoftech.spray.sprex.context.support

Class LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.newmainsoftech.spray.sprex.context.support.LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocaleFallbackHandlerCase

    public class LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler
extends Object
implements LocaleFallbackHandlerCase
    Default out-of-box implementation of LocaleFallbackHandlerCase interface.
    Author:
    Arata Y.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LanguagePolicyLocaleFallbackHandler(Locale ultimateLocale) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Locale> getFallbackLocalesList()
      Return copy of fall-back locale list having set by setFallbackLocalesList(List) method.
      Locale getNextFallbackLocale(Locale locale)
      For locale input, return fall-back locale from fall-back locale list having set by setFallbackLocalesList(List) method.
      The logic of selecting fall-back locale being used: Locale matching language, country, script. Locale matching language, country. Language locale for same language. Not thread safe only regarding locale input.
      Locale getUltimateLocale()
      Thread safe.
      boolean isUltimateLocale(Locale locale)
      Check whether locale input value is the ultimate fall-back locale having set by setUltimateLocale(Locale) method.
      Not thread safe only regarding locale input.

      Set List of fall-back locale.
      void setUltimateLocale(Locale ultimateLocale)
      Set ultimate fall-back locale.

        Specified by:

      • setUltimateLocale

        public void setUltimateLocale(Locale ultimateLocale)
        Set ultimate fall-back locale.
        Not thread safe only regarding ultimateLocale input.

      • isUltimateLocale

        public boolean isUltimateLocale(Locale locale)
        Check whether locale input value is the ultimate fall-back locale having set by setUltimateLocale(Locale) method.
        Not thread safe only regarding locale input.
        Specified by:
        isUltimateLocale in interface LocaleFallbackHandlerCase
        Returns:
        boolean value to identify whether locale input value is the ultimate fall-back locale having set with setUltimateLocale(Locale) method.

      • getFallbackLocalesList

        public List<Locale> getFallbackLocalesList()
        Return copy of fall-back locale list having set by setFallbackLocalesList(List) method. Thread safe.
        Specified by:
        getFallbackLocalesList in interface LocaleFallbackHandlerCase
        Returns:
        Copy of List of fall-back Locale objects

      • setFallbackLocalesList

        public void setFallbackLocalesList(List<Locale> fallbackLocalesList)
        Set List of fall-back locale.
        The order of locales in the fallbackLocalesList input is not matter; regarding the fall-back order among locales, refer to getNextFallbackLocale(Locale) method JavaDoc.
        Though, for thread safety (to avoid concurrent modification), fallbackLocalesList input value will be cloned inside of this method, still not thread safe only regarding fallbackLocalesList input until completion of cloning part.
        Specified by:
        setFallbackLocalesList in interface LocaleFallbackHandlerCase
        Parameters:
        fallbackLocalesList - List of fall-back locale.

      • getNextFallbackLocale

        public Locale getNextFallbackLocale(Locale locale)
        For locale input, return fall-back locale from fall-back locale list having set by setFallbackLocalesList(List) method.
        The logic of selecting fall-back locale being used:
        1. Locale matching language, country, script.
        2. Locale matching language, country.
        3. Language locale for same language.
        Not thread safe only regarding locale input.
        Specified by:
        getNextFallbackLocale in interface LocaleFallbackHandlerCase
        Parameters:
        locale - Locale to find next locale in the fall-back locale ladder.
        Returns:
        Next fall-back locale (or ultimate fall-back locale).
